text: == Events == * A series of wars begin between the Byzantine Empire and the Sassanid Empire. == Births == * Li Chunfeng * Liu Rengui * Mu'awiyah, who started the Umayyad Dynasty of caliphs (approximate date) * Xuanzang, famous Chinese Buddhist monk * Theodore of Tarsus, Archbishop of Canterbury (d. 690) * Taejong muyeol of Silla, 29th King of Silla(Korean of ancient kingdom, B.C 57 â€“ A.D 935) * Zhiyan == Deaths == * Empress Dugu Qieluo
